alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Duplin; Inland Onslow; Jones; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 19 at 4:00AM EST until January 22 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy freezing rain and sleet possible. Total sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to a quarter to a half inch possible. * WHERE...Duplin, Jones, Pamlico, Southern Craven, West Carteret, Inland Onslow and Coastal Onslow Counties. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A Winter Storm Watch means there is a potential for significant snow, sleet, or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; Duplin; Inland Onslow; Jones; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret
